roleset.name: move forwards

role.descr: aspect of arg1 that is actually progressing

example.name: start and end points
example.text: It often is preceded by the development of polyps in the bowel, which *trace*-1 in some cases become increasingly malignantin identifiable stages -- *trace*-1 progressing from less severe todeadly -- as though a cascade of genetic damage might be occurring.

example.name: progress-v: but usually just ergative
example.text: Our bookings improved as the quarter progressed and September was especially good.

example.name: progress-v: with arg2
example.text: - I had a bad start to the first term ; student finance was delayed , adding to my stress levels , I was so worried I wasunable to progress with work , conclusively it all piled up.

example.name: progression-n: Arg1
example.text: The progression of Bob's disease affected his memory.

example.name: progress-n: Arg 4 as end point
example.text: Central America 's progress toward democracy in the region

example.name: progress-n: Arg 4 as where progress is being made (because 'it' is actually making the progress)
example.text: it also is making progress in negotiating the buy-out of itsdesign division by management
example.arg: in negotiating the buy-out of itsdesign division by management

example.name: progress-n: Arg 1 where it may be confused with arg 4
progress-n: Arg 4 (because 'Texas' is actually making the progress)
example.text: Texas has made steady progress in improving education.

example.name: progressive-j
example.text: Like other features, the degree of torsion in the different ribs is progressive towards a maximum, and then towards a minimum.
example.arg: the degree of torsion in the different ribs
towards a maximum, and then towards a minimum.

roleset.note: PROGRESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'progress' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'progressive' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNclsentity_specific_cos-45.5. (from progress.01-v)
PROGRESS-N NOTES: Roleset based on progress.01. Nocorresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie. (from progress.01-n)
PROGRESSIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an aliasfile for unification. (from progressive.01-j)

roleset.name: supporting progressive politics/ideology

role.descr: domain in which progressive ideas apply

example.name: progressive-j
example.text: Although Mts. Roberts is a professional Christian, and a member of the Congregational Church, she is progressive in herideas, and keeps her eyes wide open
example.arg: Although Mts. Roberts is a professional Christian, and a member of the Congregational Church,

roleset.note: PROGRESSIVE-J NOTES: Split off from original .01 roleset by Julia for unification.
